trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Weatherford
There were no other sightings in Weatherford on or around July 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling SW on Newsom Md road approching Sabathny Rd when I noticed 3 glowing objects of light in the South skies just hovering. I pulled over to watch and noticed another vehical did the same thing as well. As I watched the hovering objects I never heard a single noise. The absence of sound and wind was very erie. Then the lights just blinked out as if someone turned off a light switch. In the past few months I have seen a diffrent glowing craft in almost the exact spot and then would just blink out, all within a half mile of the lattest sighting.
